nodes.documentation: The smart contract's constructor

The function to send purchase orders
   requires fee
   Payable functions returns just the transaction object, with no custom field.
   To get field values listen to OrderSent event.
nodes.name: sendOrder

nodes.documentation:
The function to query orders by number
   Constant functions returns custom fields
nodes.name: queryOrder

nodes.documentation:
The function to send the price to pay for order
  Just the owner can call this function
  requires fee
nodes.name: sendPrice

nodes.documentation:
The function to get the sent invoice
  requires no fee
nodes.name: getInvoice

getInvoice(uint256).notice: The function to get the sent invoice  requires no fee

queryOrder(uint256).notice: The function to query orders by number   Constant functions returns custom fields

sendOrder(string,uint256).notice: The function to send purchase orders   requires fee   Payable functions returns just the transaction object, with no custom field.   To get field values listen to OrderSent event.
